Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
DoubleJump = Tool:WaitForChild("DoubleJump")
JumpSound = Handle:WaitForChild("JumpSound")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService")
BodyParts = { {Name = "Head", Color = "Black"}, {Name = "Torso", Color = "Black"}, {Name = "Left Arm", Color = "Medium stone grey"}, {Name = "Right Arm", Color = "Medium stone grey"}, {Name = "Left Leg", Color = "Black"}, {Name = "Right Leg", Color = "Black"} }
HatId = 81724957
PackageParts = { HeadMesh = {BodyPart = Enum.BodyPart.Head, MeshId = 6340213, BaseTextureId = 0, OverlayTextureId = 0}, TorsoMesh = {BodyPart = Enum.BodyPart.Torso, MeshId = 71440868, BaseTextureId = 0, OverlayTextureId = 71440926}, LeftArmMesh = {BodyPart = Enum.BodyPart.LeftArm, MeshId = 71440752, BaseTextureId = 0, OverlayTextureId = 71440926}, RightArmMesh = {BodyPart = Enum.BodyPart.RightArm, MeshId = 71440800, BaseTextureId = 0, OverlayTextureId = 71440926}, LeftLegMesh = {BodyPart = Enum.BodyPart.LeftLeg, MeshId = 71440777, BaseTextureId = 0, OverlayTextureId = 71440926}, RightLegMesh = {BodyPart = Enum.BodyPart.RightLeg, MeshId = 71440824, BaseTextureId = 0, OverlayTextureId = 71440926} }
OriginalBrickColors = {} OriginalAssets = {} TransparentObjects = {} TemporaryAssets = {}
DoubleJumpEnabled = false SpaceBar = false CanDoubleJump = false TimeLeftGround = 0 TimeOnGround = 0
Duration = 45 ReloadTime = 15
Active = false
function GetTransparentObjects(Table) local Objects = {} for i, v in pairs(Table) do local CheckTransparency = pcall(function() return ((v["Transparency"] and true) or false) end) if CheckTransparency then table.insert(Objects, v) end end return Objects end
function TransformCharacter() for i, v in pairs(BodyParts) do local BodyPart = Character:FindFirstChild(v.Name) if BodyPart then table.insert(OriginalBrickColors, {Object = BodyPart, BrickColor = BodyPart.BrickColor}) BodyPart.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(v.Name) end end local Parts = GetAllTransparentObjects(Character) TransparentObjects = GetTransparentObjects(Parts) for i, v in pairs(Parts) do if CheckTransparency then table.insert(TransparentObjects, v) end if v:IsA("CharacterMesh") or v:IsA("Hat") or v:IsA("Clothing") then table.insert(OriginalAssets, {Object = v:Clone(), Parent = v.Parent}) v:Destroy() end end local HatModel = InsertService:LoadAsset(HatId) local Hat = HatModel:GetChildren()[1]:Clone() HatModel:Destroy() table.insert(TemporaryAssets, Hat) Hat.Parent = Character table.insert(TransparentObjects, Hat:FindFirstChild("Handle")) for i, v in pairs(PackageParts) do local CharacterMesh = Instance.new("CharacterMesh") CharacterMesh.Name = i CharacterMesh.BodyPart = v.BodyPart CharacterMesh.MeshId = v.MeshId CharacterMesh.BaseTextureId = v.BaseTextureId CharacterMesh.OverlayTextureId = v.OverlayTextureId table.insert(TemporaryAssets, CharacterMesh) CharacterMesh.Parent = Character end AntiGravityForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") AntiGravityForce.Name = "LowGravity" AntiGravityForce.force = Vector3.new(0, 2000, 0) AntiGravityForce.Parent = Torso end
function GetAllTransparentObjects(Parent) local Parts = {} local function GetTransparentObjects(Parent) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do if v ~= Tool and v ~= Handle and v.Name ~= "HumanoidRootPart" then table.insert(Parts, v) end GetTransparentObjects(v) end end GetTransparentObjects(Parent) return Parts end
function FadeTo(Parent, a, b, c) Spawn(function() for transparency = a, b, c do if not Active then break end for i, v in pairs(Parent) do if v.Name ~= "HumanoidRootPart" then v.Transparency = transparency end end wait(0.1) end end) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator.Parent = humanoid creator.Value = player creator.Name = "creator" Debris:AddItem(creator, 1) end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function InitializeDoubleJump() if TimeLeftGround ~= 0 and CanDoubleJump and TimeOnGround > 0.1 then local Smoke = {} for i = 1, 6 do local smoke = Instance.new("Smoke",workspace) smoke.Parent = Torso smoke.Size = 25 smoke.Color = Color3.new(0.3, 0.3, 0.3) table.insert(Smoke, smoke) Debris:AddItem(smoke, 4) end
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 Humanoid.Sit = true
wait()
CanDoubleJump = false TimeLeftGround = 0 Anim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(DoubleJump) Anim:Play() wait(0.35)
wait()
local JumpForce = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") JumpForce.P = 50000 JumpForce.maxForce = Vector3.new(JumpForce.P, JumpForce.P, JumpForce.P) JumpSound:play() JumpForce.Parent = Torso wait(0.5) JumpForce:Destroy() Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 wait(1) for i, v in pairs(Smoke) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end end end
function FreeFall(Falling) if Active then if Falling then TimeLeftGround = tick() TimeOnGround = (tick() - TimeOnGround) CanDoubleJump = true else TimeLeftGround = 0 TimeOnGround = tick() CanDoubleJump = false end end end
function CleanUp() if AntiGravityForce and AntiGravityForce.Parent then AntiGravityForce:Destroy() end DoubleJumpEnabled = false for i, v in pairs(TemporaryAssets) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end for i, v in pairs(OriginalAssets) do if v.Parent and v.Parent.Parent then v.Object.Parent = v.Parent end for i, v in pairs(OriginalBrickColors) do if v.Object and v.Object.Parent then v.Object.BrickColor = v.BrickColor end end end for i, v in pairs(TransparentObjects) do if v and v.Parent then v.Transparency = 0 end end OriginalBrickColors = {} OriginalAssets = {} TemporaryAssets = {} TransparentObjects = {} end
function Activated() if Tool.Enabled and not Active then Active = true Tool.Enabled = false DoubleJumpEnabled = true Handle.Transparency = 1 TransformCharacter() FadeTo(TransparentObjects, 0.0,0.8,0.05) local StartTime = tick() while Active and (tick() - StartTime) < Duration do wait(0.1) end if Active then CleanUp() wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true Active = false end end end
function KeyDown(Key) local Key = Key:lower() if Key == string.char(32) then if not SpaceBar and CanDoubleJump then SpaceBar = true InitializeDoubleJump() end end end
function KeyUp(Key) local Key = Key:lower() if Key == string.char(32) then SpaceBar = false end end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end if not Tool.Enabled then wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end FreeFallingConnection = Humanoid.FreeFalling:connect(FreeFall) Mouse.Button1Down:connect(Activated) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(KeyDown) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(KeyUp) end
function Unequipped() Active = false Handle.Transparency = 0 if FreeFallingConnection then FreeFallingConnection:disconnect() end SpaceBar = false CleanUp() end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
